RAW.SOURCE:
` *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Subroutine Pool YGPL_MT_ROUTINE_POOL *& *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& *& *&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
PROGRAM ygpl_mt_routine_pool.
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Form set_limits *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM set_limits USING p_act p_p_min p_p_max p_t_min p_t_max CHANGING p_limits TYPE ygpl_mt_typespool=>ts_limits. p_limits-active = p_act. p_limits-progress-mini = p_p_min. p_limits-progress-maxi = p_p_max. p_limits-time-mini = p_t_min. p_limits-time-maxi = p_t_max. ENDFORM. "set_limits
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Form get_limits *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM get_limits USING p_limits TYPE ygpl_mt_typespool=>ts_limits CHANGING p_act p_p_min p_p_max p_t_min p_t_max. p_act = p_limits-active. p_p_min = p_limits-progress-mini. p_p_max = p_limits-progress-maxi. p_t_min = p_limits-time-mini. p_t_max = p_limits-time-maxi. ENDFORM. " CREATE_LIMITS
